title: A guide for writing engineering thesis for ITC students
text: This guide aims to provide an standard format and tips to write a correct thesis report. Keep in mind that is guide is apply to only the students from Institute of Technology of Cambodia, mainly the department of Industrial and Mechanical engineering.
